Tolkien-related events that took place in 1977.

content.title: January
content.content:
13 - Actor Orlando Bloom is born.
17 - Adam Fox, Inkling, dies.

content.title: February
content.content: 14 - The Mythology of Middle-earth, Ruth S. Noel's first book on Tolkien's works, is published.

content.title: April
content.content: 1 - J.R.R. Tolkien's children found The Tolkien Trust charity.

content.title: May
content.content:
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography is first published in the UK.
16 - Singer Emiliana Torrini is born.

content.title: June
content.content:
11 - The first Wisconsin Ring Game is held at Governor Dodge State Park in southern Wisconsin.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography is published in the US.

content.title: September
content.content:
1 - Cliffs Notes on Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit is published.
15 - The Silmarillion is published by Christopher Tolkien.
23-25 - Oxonmoot 1977.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - Ted Johnstone dies.
27 - The Hobbit (1977 film) is released on VHS in the United States.
